item.title: Divided Fed officials saw another two interest rate cuts by the end of 2025, minutes show
item.description: Officials were strongly inclined to lower rates, with the only dispute seeming to be over how many cuts were coming.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: TopBuild, Confluent, Alcoa, Viasat, Joby Aviation and others
item.description: These are some of the stocks posting the largest moves midday.

item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Ray Dalio says today is like the early 1970s and investors should hold more gold than usual
item.description: "Gold is the only asset that somebody can hold and you don't have to depend on somebody else to pay you money for," Dalio said.
